phrases: She is not as pale as she was before.
I could never forget you after what you would done to me.
You always because me so much trouble.
You accepted my deal, after all.
You are the same as me.
Your curse is as powerful as mine.
I am cursed to live on forever.
So give me your left arm.
It is my arm that you want?
That part looks the most usable right now.
I will give you a part of me in exchange.
That way, you will have a body that can never die.
Are you saying you have another option?
Do I just need to give you my arm?
First, let us make sure my body does not reject it.
You might be freed from your curse.
You will not change into another form or anything.
I was just thinking about how I still hate you.
Do not worry, you will not die just from bleeding.
It does not seem like my body's rejecting it.
Your eyeball makes the world look bright and shiny.
We are the only people in this world who see what we do.
I will have your arm once the curse settles in.
It will all be done while you are asleep.
I am going to borrow the power that is left in your eye.
It was not too scary, was it?
Yeah, Fumiki was with me, so everything's okay.
Fumiki's lucky he takes after his dad.
This is before my dad and little brother vanished.
Hey, I can change his diaper now!
You are a good girl, too, Chise.
Mommy, Mommy, I want to help make dinner.
What should I have you do?
She used to have a really happy smile.
You are going to get wet.
I guess I took after my dad.
I have more night shifts now.
I wish I could work, too.
You already take care of things around the house, Chika.
She is got a frail body.
I feel better with you around her.
Mom was the same as me?
He is keeping me in a dream so that I do not wake up.
I am a fragment of him that is been chopped off.
He is attached and assumed all kinds of things.
Which is the real him, what he even was to begin with...
none of it is clear anymore.
Why is he making me see all this stuff from my past?
That there is hurting you, but it is also protecting you.
It is the reason you are able to talk to something like me.
You do not want to touch me.
It is okay, I will calm him down.
No, I will be right back.
Ever since Hatori-san showed up, right?
I was the one who said you cannot be scared.
That guy who was protecting them is not around lately.
He must have gotten sick of her.
I will be okay on my own.
It would be so much easier for me without her.
But, if she were not here...
I should not have given birth to you.
I should not have given birth to you.
It is because your body is so weak.
Die, die, die, die, die, die, die...
Why did not you finish me off, then?
You are not my real mom.
You are the mom that exists inside of me.
The mom that I created after she strangled me.
I am glad I talked to Nevin.
Lindel-san, the people of the fairy world...
I am glad I got to meet all kinds of people.
Without them, I would have died before I would met you.
You endured for my sake, did not you?
You endured and endured, but in the end...
I have lots of happy memories with you.
And yet, ever since that day, I could not remember any of them.
I met someone that I cared for even more than myself.
I thought he was strong, but he turned out to be pretty troubled.
Thanks for letting go of me that day.
I will not forget you yet,
but I am going to leave you and move on.
I am what keeps one living on.
The curse and blessing that was given for his sake.
They planted me in you, and you are trying to accept me.
So as long as you wish to live, I will be your blessing.
Even if that means tearing at what consumes and protects you for all eternity.
What you say sounds good only for me.
There is one wish that I have heard many times.
Can you grant that for me?
It looks like it is starting to set in.
I am going to do things the way you do.
I do not know if I can grant you your wish.
But I can hear you out, and try to do something.
they have been shouting, Help me.
I do not know why you desire this.
Why, when you think as you do, you still do this.
So I am going to find out.
The girl tries to make sense of Joseph's truth.
Meanwhile, the mage, having lost the girl, loses his human form, and is forced to wander.
